channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Damage to Grass Verge Opposite Cheltenham Fencing, GL51 0WS, 6th May
item.description:
Report ongoing damage to the grass verge located opposite Cheltenham Fencing, GL51 0WS. Vehicles are frequently parked on this verge (please see the attached pictures of these cars parked here every day), leading to significant wear and damage. The constant parking has caused the grass to fade and die off, leaving muddy, unsightly patches. This not only affects the appearance of the area but also results in maintenance issues. The council staff responsible for cutting the grass are often unable to reach these sections due to obstructing vehicles, so the area is regularly left uncut and continues to deteriorate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface
